verses.text: \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* there arose \w a|strong="H7121"\w* sedition \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* towards \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Jephte: \w When|strong="H1121"\w* thou wentest \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w why|strong="H4069"\w* wouldst thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H7121"\w* we \w might|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee? Therefore we \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w called|strong="H2199"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w assist|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* deserved, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w rise|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* calling \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Galaad, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Galaad \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Galaad \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w fugitive|strong="H6412"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* Manasses.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Galaadites secured \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fords \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w by|strong="H1961"\w* which \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* return. \w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* number \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* thither \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flight, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* beseech \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Galaadites \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: Art thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w Ephraimite|strong="H0673"\w*? \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w asked|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w then|strong="H1696"\w*, Scibboleth, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* interpreted, \w An|strong="H7819"\w* ear \w of|strong="H6256"\w* corn. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Sibboleth|strong="H5451"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* being able \w to|strong="H0413"\w* express \w an|strong="H7819"\w* ear \w of|strong="H6256"\w* corn \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* letter. \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* presently \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H0669"\w* \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w very|strong="H3651"\w* passage \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. \w And|strong="H0669"\w* there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H0669"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Jephte \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Galaadite \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* Galaad.
\w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* Abesan \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* many \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, whom \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* husbands, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* wives \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H4480"\w* number, \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* house. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*:
\w And|strong="H4191"\w* \w he|strong="H6912"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

\w To|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w succeeded|strong="H0310"\w* Ahialon \w a|strong="H3478"\w* Zabulonite: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*:
\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0776"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* Zabulon.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Illel, \w a|strong="H3478"\w* Pharathonite, \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w mounted|strong="H7392"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* ass \w colts|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0776"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* Pharathon \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amalech.
